description:
A set of eight weapons for all jobs.

The following items are included:
Broadsword, Seasoned Katana(L), Morning Star, Lance, Moon Jamadhar, Wisp Rod, Spirit Staff, Raider's Bow

*DLC items can be obtained by entering your room on the second floor of the Dragon Inn after downloading the game.
*This content is available for a limited time only.
ã€€Period: January 6, 2022 - February 16, 2022
name: You Can Be a Veteran Hunter Too! Weapon Set
